classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as benzenesulfonamides. These are organic compounds containing a sulfonamide group that is S-linked to a benzene ring.

drug-interaction.name: Aminobenzoic acid
drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Succinylsulfathiazole can be decreased when used in combination with Aminobenzoic acid.

drug-interaction.description: The risk or severity of adverse effects can be increased when Succinylsulfathiazole is combined with Nicotine.
